GSD.product_version: versions from v3.14 to before v5.15.82
GSD.description:
hwmon: (coretemp) fix pci device refcount leak in nv1a_ram_new()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.82 by commit 6e035d5a2a6b907cfce9a80c5f442c2e459cd34e, it was introduced in version v3.14 by commit 14513ee696a0cd12a19318e433b75a786808adc3. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: hwmon: (coretemp) fix pci device refcount leak in nv1a_ram_new()
